title: Invalid debug info crashes dsymutil (NULL DIE)

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: A-debuginfo
labels.description: Area: Debugging information in compiled programs (DWARF, PDB, etc.)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I'm experiencing frequent cashes of `llvm-dsymutil` when building Rust projects with debug info (`cargo build`). The [LLVM bug report for the crash](https://bugs.llvm.org/show_bug.cgi?id=33873) itself [concludes](https://bugs.llvm.org/show_bug.cgi?id=33873#c11) that it's fault of invalid debug information provided, with `NULL` `DIE`.
